Pre-Game Insights: Michael Wacha will start for the Kansas City Royals.
Tanner Bibee will start for the Cleveland Guardians.
The Royals are fifth in the majors in runs scored while sitting sixth in batting average, 12th in on-base percentage, and seventh in slugging.
The Guardians sit 12th in the majors in runs while sitting 22nd in batting average, 18th in on-base percentage, and 17th in slugging.
The Royals' Bobby Witt Jr. is hitting.347 on the year with a.399 on-base percentage.
The Guardians' Jose Ramirez leads the way with 33 home runs and 104 RBIs.
The Royals are hitting.274 in the last week with 25 runs scored in six games.
The Guardians have hit just.208 against Michael Wacha in 48 career at-bats.
